title: Glasgow
name: Glasgow Cross
address: At the junction of Trongate, Saltmarket, High Street, Gallowgate and London Road
content: This intersection marks the original medieval centre of the city and is dominated by the clock tower of the original City Chambers (destroyed by fire in 1926), and the small hexagonal building known as the Tolbooth. Just to the west on Trongate is the '''Tron Theatre''', a former church that was turned into a prominent theatre.
